trans-unit.source: Represents a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en arbeidsflytforekomst.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The WorkflowInstance class exposes methods and properties that can be used to control the execution of a workflow instance; it is essentially a proxy to the actual workflow instance used by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Klassen WorkflowInstance inneholder metoder og egenskaper som kan brukes til å kontrollere kjøringen av en arbeidsflytforekomst; Det er egentlig en proxy for den faktiske arbeidsflytforekomsten som brukes av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren.

trans-unit.source: A host or a service can instruct the workflow runtime engine to perform actions on a workflow instance by calling the appropriate methods that are contained in the WorkflowInstance class.
trans-unit.target: Vert eller en tjeneste du kan be arbeidsflyten runtime motoren å utføre handlinger på en arbeidsflytforekomst ved å kalle riktig metodene som finnes i WorkflowInstance klassen.

trans-unit.source: If the requested action is not valid, for example, if the host calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Load%2A> on a workflow instance that has already completed, the workflow runtime engine will raise an appropriate exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den ønskede handlingen ikke er gyldig for eksempel hvis verten kaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Load%2A>arbeidsflyten runtime motoren vil vise et passende unntak på en arbeidsflytforekomst som er allerede fullført.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a workflow instance becomes unresponsive because a call on the host application does not return, the only way to recover the instance is to restart the runtime.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Om en arbeidsflytforekomst ikke svarer fordi en oppringing på vertsprogram ikke returnerer, er den eneste måten å gjenopprette forekomsten starte kjøretiden.

trans-unit.source: However, if the instance has been forcibly unloaded, aborted, or suspended, it can be continued by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Resume%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis forekomsten vil bli lastet tvang, avbrutt eller deaktiveres, den kan fortsette ved å kalle den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Resume%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Resume%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Aborts the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow instance is aborted in a synchronous manner; that is, the method returns after the workflow instance has been aborted.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflytforekomsten ble avbrutt på en synkron måte; Det vil si returneres når arbeidsflytforekomsten ble avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine invalidates the workflow instance in memory and clears the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren ugyldiggjøres arbeidsflytforekomsten i minnet, og fjerner <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a persistence service was used by your workflow instance, all work performed since the last persistence point is thrown away.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen fast tjeneste ble brukt av din arbeidsflytforekomsten, utføres alle arbeid fordi det siste punktet utholdenhet er slettes.

trans-unit.source: After it aborts the workflow instance, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowAborted> event.
trans-unit.target: Når den avbryter arbeidsflytforekomsten, arbeidsflyt runtime motoren opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowAborted>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowAborted>

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A> to reload the workflow instance and start from its last persistence point.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ringe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A>for å laste inn arbeidsflytforekomsten og starte fra det siste punktet utholdenhet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Abort` is different from <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A> in that while `Abort` simply clears the in-memory workflow instance and can be restarted from the last persistence point, Terminate clears the in-memory workflow instance and informs the persistence service that the instance has been cleared from memory.
trans-unit.target: `Abort`er forskjellig fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A>i at `Abort` bare tømmes i minnet arbeidsflytforekomsten og startes på nytt fra det siste punktet i utholdenhet Avslutt tømmes arbeidsflytforekomsten i minnet, og informerer om tjenesten utholdenhet at forekomsten er fjernet fra minnet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>, this means that all state information for that workflow instance is deleted from the database upon termination.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>, dette betyr at alle tilstandsinformasjon for at arbeidsflytforekomsten er slettet fra databasen ved avslutning.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: You will not be able to reload the workflow instance from a previously stored persistence point.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke laste inn arbeidsflytforekomsten fra et tidligere lagret utholdenhet.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: Applies changes to the workflow instance specified by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruker endringer på arbeidsflytforekomsten som er angitt av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance is not already suspended, the workflow runtime engine temporarily suspends the instance before applying the changes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten ikke allerede er deaktivert, deaktiverer arbeidsflyten runtime motoren midlertidig forekomsten før endringene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"></xref> specifying dynamic updates for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"> </xref> angir dynamiske oppdateringer for arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the specified workflow queue synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Legger en melding til den angitte arbeidsflyt køen synkront.

trans-unit.source: Sends the `item` to the specified <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Sender den `item` til den angitte <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>

trans-unit.source: If you want to be notified when the message is delivered, you can implement <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> in your service and pass a `workItem` and an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> object to EnqueueItem.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bli varslet når leveres meldingen, du kan implementere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>service, og pass en `workItem` og en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>objekt EnqueueItem.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want such notification, you can pass a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for `pendingWork` and `workItem`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke vil varsling om, kan du sende en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) for `pendingWork` og `workItem`.

trans-unit.source: When using this method with a state machine workflow, you might get an exception with the message "Queue '{0}' is not enabled."
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker denne metoden i en tilstand maskinen arbeidsflyt, kan du få et unntak med meldingen "køen: {0} ikke er aktivert."

trans-unit.source: This happens when the current state of the state machine does not know how to handle a specific event.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer når den gjeldende tilstanden til maskin for tilstand ikke vet behandlingsmåten for en bestemt hendelse.

trans-unit.source: For example, when some state other than the current state contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> that is represented by the queue '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når en annen tilstand enn den gjeldende tilstanden inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>som inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>som representeres av køen, {0}.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Messages are not guaranteed to be received by the workflow instance in the order that they were sent.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Meldinger garanteres mottas av arbeidsflytforekomsten i rekkefølgen som de ble sendt.

trans-unit.source: For example, if receiving a message in an existing queue (Queue A) causes a workflow to create another queue (Queue B), which then listens for another message sent after the first message, it is possible that the second message will arrive first, and will not be received due to its queue not being created yet.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis mottak av en melding i en eksisterende kø (køen A) gjør at en arbeidsflyt til å opprette en annen kø (køen B), som lytter for en ny melding sendt etter den første meldingen, er det mulig at den andre meldingen kommer først, og vil ikke bli mottatt på grunn av køen som enda ikke opprettet.

trans-unit.source: To prevent this issue, the second message should not be sent until the presence of the second queue is verified (using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A>.)
trans-unit.target: For å unngå problemet, den andre meldingen kan ikke sendes til tilstedeværelsen av andre køen er bekreftet (ved hjelp av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A>.)</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to enqueue.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som køplassering.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> that allows the sender to be notified when `item` is delivered.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref> som gjør det mulig avsenderen som skal varsles når `item` leveres.

trans-unit.source: An object to be passed to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> methods.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som skal sendes til den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref> metoder.

trans-unit.source: queueName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: queueNameer en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified by queueName does not exist.
trans-unit.target: - eller - angitt av queueName finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified by queueName is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: - eller - angitt av queueName er ikke aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the specified workflow queue when the workflow is idle.
trans-unit.target: Legger en melding til køen angitt arbeidsflyten når arbeidsflyten er inaktiv.

trans-unit.source: EnqueueItemOnIdle waits until the workflow reaches an idle point and enqueues after verifying that the workflow scheduler is idle (that is, no active operation is being executed).
trans-unit.target: EnqueueItemOnIdle venter til arbeidsflyten når en inaktiv punkt- og enqueues etter å ha kontrollert at arbeidsflyten scheduler er inaktiv (det vil si ingen aktive operasjon utføres).

trans-unit.source: Waits for the workflow instance to become idle and then sends the `item` to the specified <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Venter på arbeidsflytforekomsten skal bli inaktiv og sender den `item` til den angitte <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>

trans-unit.source: If you call EnqueueItemOnIdle while the workflow instance is suspended, the workflow runtime engine will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller EnqueueItemOnIdle mens arbeidsflytforekomsten er deaktivert, throw arbeidsflyt runtime motoren <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If you want to be notified when the message is delivered, you can implement <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> in your service and pass a `workItem` and an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> object to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bli varslet når leveres meldingen, du kan implementere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>service, og pass en `workItem` og et <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>objekt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want such notification, you can pass a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for `pendingWork` and `workItem`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke vil varsling om, kan du sende en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) for `pendingWork` og `workItem`.

trans-unit.source: When you are using this method with a state machine workflow, you might get an exception that contains the message "Queue '{0}' is not enabled."
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker denne metoden i en tilstand maskinen arbeidsflyt, kan du få et unntak som inneholder meldingen "Køen: {0} er ikke aktivert."

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the current state of the state machine does not know how to handle a specific event.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer når den gjeldende tilstanden til maskin for tilstand ikke vet behandlingsmåten for en bestemt hendelse.

trans-unit.source: For example, when some state other than the current state contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> that is represented by the queue '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når en annen tilstand enn den gjeldende tilstanden inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>som inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>som representeres av køen, {0}.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to enqueue.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som køplassering.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> that allows the sender to be notified when `item` is delivered.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref> som gjør det mulig avsenderen som skal varsles når `item` leveres.

trans-unit.source: An object to be passed to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> methods.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som skal sendes til den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref> metoder.

trans-unit.source: queueName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: queueNameer en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: -or- The workflow instance is suspended.
trans-unit.target: - eller - arbeidsflytforekomsten er fullført.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified by queueName does not exist.
trans-unit.target: - eller - angitt av queueName finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified by queueName is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: - eller - angitt av queueName er ikke aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified object is equal to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om det angitte objektet er lik den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object must be an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> class and have the same <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A> as this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet må være en forekomst av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>klassen og har den samme <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A>som <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det angitte objektet er lik dette <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer hashkoden for denne arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: GetHashCode returns a hash code based on the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: GetHashCode returnerer en hash-kode som er basert på verdien for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hash-kode for denne <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the root activity for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter den primære aktiviteten for denne arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: You can use the root activity to navigate the activity hierarchy of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den primære aktiviteten for å navigere aktivitetshierarkiet for arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: This method is not thread safe, so the host should synchronize its calls to this method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er ikke tråd trygt, så verten bør synkronisere kallene til denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the next point in time that this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref> is scheduled to be delivered a timer message.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer neste peker i tid som denne <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref> er planlagt å levere en tidtaker-melding.

trans-unit.source: A DateTime value that represents the next <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt*> time this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref> will be delivered a timer message.
trans-unit.target: En dato/klokkeslett-verdi som representerer neste <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt*>time dette <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref> vil bli levert en tidtaker-melding.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo"></xref> objects that contains the pending items and subscribed activities for the workflow queues associated with this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo"> </xref> objekter som inneholder elementer som skal og abonnerer aktiviteter for arbeidsflyt-køene som er forbundet med denne arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: GetWorkflowQueueData returns a collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo> objects, each of which contains information about the state of one of the workflow queues associated with this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: GetWorkflowQueueData returnerer en samling av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo>objekter, som inneholder informasjon om tilstanden til en arbeidsflyt-køene som er forbundet med denne arbeidsflytforekomsten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> contains the pending items for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo.SubscribedActivityNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName> contains a list of the activities that are subscribed for item delivery on a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName>inneholder elementer som skal for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo.SubscribedActivityNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName>inneholder en liste over aktivitetene som abonnerer for elementet levering <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo.SubscribedActivityNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter den unike identifikatoren for arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: You can use InstanceId to reference the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke InstanceId for å referere til arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>til arbeidsflytforekomsten.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Loads a previously unloaded workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en tidligere utlastet arbeidsflytforekomst.

trans-unit.source: Load is synchronous; if the workflow instance can be loaded, Load will return after the workflow instance has been loaded into memory and scheduled by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Er synkron; Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten kan lastes, tilbakestiller innlasting etter arbeidsflytforekomsten er lastet inn i minnet og planlagt av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren.

trans-unit.source: The runtime raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowLoaded> event after the persistence service has restored the workflow instance in memory, but before the workflow runtime engine schedules the instance.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretiden opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowLoaded>hendelsen etter utholdenhet-tjenesten har gjenopprettet arbeidsflytforekomsten i minnet, men før arbeidsflyten planlegger runtime motoren forekomsten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowLoaded>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: Reload the tracking profiles for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Last inn sporing-profiler for denne arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure will reload each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for this workflow instance associated with its tracking channels.
trans-unit.target: Kjøring sporing infrastruktur Last inn hver <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>for denne arbeidsflytforekomsten som er knyttet til de sporing kanalene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: If it is not already in a suspended state, the workflow is temporarily suspended by the runtime tracking infrastructure while the tracking profiles are reloaded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den ikke allerede er i deaktivert tilstand, stanses midlertidig arbeidsflyten av kjøretiden sporing infrastruktur under sporing-profiler er lastet inn på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: Resumes execution of a previously suspended workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Gjenopptar kjøringen av en tidligere avbrutt arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The host can call Resume to resume execution of a workflow instance that has been previously suspended.
trans-unit.target: Verten kan ringe Fortsett for å fortsette kjøringen av en arbeidsflytforekomst som tidligere har stoppet.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance is not in the suspended state, no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten ikke er deaktivert, ble ingen handling utført.

trans-unit.source: The runtime raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed> event just before execution of the workflow instance is resumed.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretiden opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed>hendelsen like før kjøringen av arbeidsflytforekomsten er gjenopptatt.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: Starts the execution of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Starter kjøringen av arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Start calls <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ExecuteActivity%2A> on the root activity of this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Start kall <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ExecuteActivity%2A>på roten aktiviteten til denne arbeidsflytforekomsten.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ExecuteActivity%2A>

trans-unit.source: If Start encounters an exception, it terminates the workflow instance by calling <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A> with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the exception passed as the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Start oppstår et unntak, avbrytes arbeidsflytforekomsten ved å kalle <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A>med den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>for unntaket sendt som årsaken til avslutningen.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: -or- The workflow instance has already been started.
trans-unit.target: - eller - arbeidsflytforekomsten er allerede startet.

trans-unit.source: Suspends the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Stopper arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow instance is suspended in a synchronous manner.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflytforekomsten er stoppet på en synkron måte.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance is already suspended, no action is taken; otherwise, the workflow runtime engine suspends the workflow instance, raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended> event and passes `reason` in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten er allerede stoppet, vil ingen handling ble utført; Ellers arbeidsflyten runtime motoren stopper arbeidsflytforekomsten hever den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended>hendelsen og formidler `reason` i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Suspend does not unload the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvile blir ikke fjernet arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A description of the reason for suspending the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse av årsak for å utsette arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: Terminates the workflow instance in a synchronous manner.
trans-unit.target: Avslutter arbeidsflytforekomsten på en synkron måte.

trans-unit.source: The workflow instance is terminated in a synchronous manner.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflytforekomsten avsluttes på en synkron måte.

trans-unit.source: The host calls Terminate to terminate the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Verten kaller Avslutt avslutte arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine clears the in-memory workflow instance and informs the persistence service that the instance has been cleared from memory.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren tømmes i minnet arbeidsflytforekomsten og informerer tjenesten utholdenhet at forekomsten er fjernet fra minnet.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>, this means that all state information for that workflow instance is deleted from the database upon termination.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>, dette betyr at alle tilstandsinformasjon for at arbeidsflytforekomsten er slettet fra databasen ved avslutning.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: You will not be able to reload the workflow instance from a previously stored persistence point.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke laste inn arbeidsflytforekomsten fra et tidligere lagret utholdenhet.

trans-unit.source: After the in-memory workflow instance is cleared and the persistence service is informed of the termination, the `Terminate` method raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated> event and passes `reason` in the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Når i minnet arbeidsflytforekomsten fjernes, og tjenesten utholdenhet informert om avslutning, den `Terminate` metoden hever den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated>hendelsen og formidler `reason` i <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen for et <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>finnes i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated>

trans-unit.source: `Terminate` is different from <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A> in that while Terminate clears the in-memory workflow instance and informs the persistence service of the termination, `Abort` simply clears the in-memory workflow instance, which can then be restarted from the last persistence point.
trans-unit.target: `Terminate`er forskjellig fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A>i som under Avslutt fjernes i minnet arbeidsflytforekomsten og informerer tjenesten utholdenhet avslutning, `Abort` tømmes ganske enkelt i minnet arbeidsflytforekomsten, som kan startes på nytt fra det siste punktet utholdenhet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A>

trans-unit.source: A description of the reason for terminating the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse av årsaken til avslutter arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine is not running.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime databasemotoren kjører ikke.

trans-unit.source: Unloads the workflow instance from memory to the persistence store when the instance is suspended or idle.
trans-unit.target: Laster ut arbeidsflytforekomsten fra minnet til vedvarende lager når forekomsten er deaktivert eller inaktiv.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance is idle or suspended, TryUnload uses the persistence service to remove the workflow instance from memory and persist it to a data store.
trans-unit.target: Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten er inaktiv eller avbrutte, bruker TryUnload utholdenhet tjenesten å fjerne arbeidsflytforekomsten fra minnet og beholde den til en datalageret.

trans-unit.source: If there is no persistence service registered with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>, TryUnload throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen utholdenhet-tjeneste som er registrert med <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>oppstår det et <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> TryUnload</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance is successfully persisted, the runtime raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> event, and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten er vellykket fast, kjøretiden opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded>hendelsen, og returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A> returns `false` if the workflow instance has already been unloaded, has been terminated, has been aborted, or has already completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A>Returnerer `false` Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten allerede er lastet ut, er avsluttet, ble avbrutt eller er allerede fullført.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A>

trans-unit.source: The host can use TryUnload to reclaim system resources from an idle workflow.
trans-unit.target: Verten kan bruke TryUnload for å frigjøre systemressurser fra en inaktiv arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow instance was unloaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten ble utlastet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no persistence service registered with the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes ingen utholdenhet-tjeneste som er registrert med arbeidsflyten runtime-motoren.

trans-unit.source: Unloads the workflow instance from memory to the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: Laster ut arbeidsflytforekomsten fra minnet til vedvarende lager.

trans-unit.source: This call blocks until after the currently scheduled work is finished, or the end of a transaction scope.
trans-unit.target: Kallet blokkerer før etter at det gjeldende planlagte arbeidet er ferdig, eller på slutten av en transaksjonsområdet.

trans-unit.source: Unload is synchronous; that is, it returns after completing any action that it performs.
trans-unit.target: Last opp er synkron; Det vil si returneres når du har fullført handlingen som utføres.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance is not idle, the runtime waits until the instance can be interrupted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten er inaktiv, venter kjøretiden til forekomsten kan avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: An instance can only be interrupted after the currently scheduled work item completes; this is typically when the currently running Activity returns from its <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst kan bare avbrytes etter at gjeldende planlagte arbeidselementet er fullført; Dette er vanligvis når kjørende aktiviteten returnerer fra den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Execute%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the instance is executing a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>, the transaction scope must complete execution before the instance can be interrupted.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis forekomsten kjører en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>, transaksjonsområdet må fullføres kjøring før forekomsten kan avbrytes.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Unload then uses the persistence service to remove the workflow instance from memory and persists it to a data store.
trans-unit.target: Last opp bruker tjenesten utholdenhet fjerne arbeidsflytforekomsten fra minnet og vedvarer til en datalageret.

trans-unit.source: If there is no persistence service registered with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>, Unload throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen utholdenhet-tjeneste som er registrert med <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>oppstår det et <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> fjerning</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance is successfully persisted, the runtime raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten er vellykket fast, kjøretiden opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded>

trans-unit.source: The host can use Unload to reclaim system resources from an idle workflow.
trans-unit.target: Verten kan bruke fjerning for å frigjøre systemressurser fra en inaktiv arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: There is no persistence service registered with the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes ingen utholdenhet-tjeneste som er registrert med arbeidsflyten runtime-motoren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> for denne arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> that represents the execution environment in which this workflow instance is running.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> som representerer kjøring miljøet som denne arbeidsflytforekomsten kjører.
